title: Vance Packard - 1959 - The Status Seekers-David McKay (217p).pdf
description:
Mr. Packard argued that ''under its gloss of prosperity,'' the nation was becoming more socially divided as Americans tried desperately ''to find new ways to draw lines that will separate the elect from the non-elect.''

This book offers an exploration of class behavior in America and the hidden barriers that affect you, your community and your future.
